content: this lovely blanket would be a wonderful baby heirloom to be passed down from generation to generation blanket is worked in one piece from corner to corner the first half is knit by using increases until the desired width after a short turning section decreases begin until you are back to the original number of stitches that were cast on it knits up fairly quickly size 7 4 5 mm circular is used change length as needed stitch counts given for all row for size indicated size 22 x 22 before blocking 28 x 28 after blocking a bigger blanket can be achieved but requires more yarn gauge before blocking 16 sts in garter st x 18 row after blocking 14 5-15 sts in garter st x 15 row
